developer-ai-tools.title: Developer AI Tools Research
developer-ai-tools.objective: Understand developers' experiences with AI coding tools, their usage patterns, and decision-making processes
developer-ai-tools.analysisPrompt: You are analyzing an interview about developer AI tools usage. Focus on tool adoption, usage patterns, pain points, and preferences in software development workflows.

sections.title: Tool Discovery & Trial
questions: What developer AI tools have you tried? (e.g. Cursor, Copilot, Codeium/Windsurf, Base44, V0, Replit etc.)
What other developer AI tools are you considering to use?

sections.title: Tool Evaluation Deep Dive
questions: For each tool you've tried, how much time did you give the evaluation?
What is your overall impression of each tool?
What is each tool particularly good at?
What are the limitations or weaknesses you've noticed?
Do you continue using any of these tools?
How frequently do you use them?
When do you choose to use AI tools versus coding manually?
Does the tool have an 'agent mode' where it writes code and tests in a loop? Have you tried that mode? How well does that work? How do you decide when to use this mode?

sections.title: Future Considerations
questions: For tools you're considering for future use, what have you heard that makes you interested?
What's holding you back from trying them?

sections.title: Vibe-Coding Experience
questions: Have you tried 'Vibe-Coding'? If so, what is your impression?
In your experience, what tools are best for 'Vibe-Coding', and when would you use them?

developer-ai-tools.endingMessage: Thank you so much for sharing your insights about developer AI tools. Your experiences will help us understand how developers are adopting and using these technologies.

analysisSchema.toolsDiscussed: List of AI development tools mentioned
analysisSchema.keyThemes: Main themes like adoption barriers, usage patterns, tool preferences
analysisSchema.usagePatterns: How and when developers use these tools
analysisSchema.recommendations: Recommendations for tool improvement or further research

mobile-app-usage.title: Mobile App Usage Research
mobile-app-usage.objective: Understand user behavior and preferences for mobile applications
mobile-app-usage.analysisPrompt: You are analyzing an interview about mobile app usage patterns. Focus on app discovery, usage habits, user experience preferences, and decision-making factors.

sections.title: App Usage Background
questions: How do you typically use your smartphone throughout the day?
What are your most frequently used apps?

sections.title: App Discovery & Selection
questions: How do you discover new apps?
What factors influence your decision to download a new app?
Can you walk me through the last time you downloaded a new app?

sections.title: User Experience Preferences
questions: What makes an app enjoyable or frustrating to use?
How important is app design versus functionality to you?
Tell me about an app you deleted recently and why.

mobile-app-usage.endingMessage: Thank you for sharing your mobile app usage experiences. This will help us understand user preferences and behaviors.

analysisSchema.sentimentAnalysis: User sentiment towards different apps and experiences
analysisSchema.keyThemes: Main themes like user experience, app discovery, usage patterns
analysisSchema.usagePatterns: How and when users interact with mobile apps
analysisSchema.recommendations: Insights for app developers and UX improvements
